Title: Full Stack Game Developer with VR/AR Experience focusing on Meta App Level
Description:
We're seeking a Full Stack Game Developer who specializes in Virtual Reality (VR) and
Augmented Reality (AR) to bring our innovative metaverse application to life. This role is ideal for a passionate, skilled developer who is able to manage both the aesthetics and the technical aspects of game development.
Key Responsibilities:
● Designing and implementing engaging 3D environments and experiences.
● Front-end development, including 3D modeling, UI/UX design, and creating visual elements that users interact within the metaverse.
● Back-end development, which includes server management, database integration, and crafting application logic.
● Leveraging your expertise with game engines such as Unity or Unreal Engine, which are key to metaverse application development.
Required Skills & Experience:
● Proficient in C# (for Unity) or C++ (for Unreal Engine).
● Proven experience in VR/AR development.
● Ability to work with both front and back end of game development.
● Understanding of the unique design considerations and technical challenges that come with VR/AR development.
Please note: developing a metaverse application is a sophisticated process that demands a diverse range of specialized skills. We're looking for a committed developer who's ready to rise to the challenge.
If you are eager to push the boundaries of VR/AR technology and leave your mark on the metaverse, we'd love to hear from you. Apply today!
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: ₹25,000.00 - ₹50,000.00 per month

Title: Full Stack Developer
Description:
Position Summary
At Indigo, cloud computing continues to allow us to modernize and consolidate IT infrastructure, automate workloads, and pursue next-generation innovation. To continue this transformation, we’re seeking an full stack developers who will be part of our Cloud COE and perform cloud native development. The ideal candidate should be skilled in full lifecycle development and well versed with modern software development toolset, strategies. and ability to customize them to help our App innovation and modernization goals.
Objectives of this Role
Work in tandem with Cloud Engineering team to identify, refactor and migrate application workloads in the most optimal cloud-based platforms.
Ensure application performance, uptime, and scale, maintaining high standards of code quality and thoughtful design.
Develop cloud native applications for new business requirements.
Job Key Responsibilities
Develop and implement technical design for building and deployment applications, including large-scale data processing, computationally intensive statistical modelling, and advanced analytics
Participate in all aspects of the software development life cycle for Cloud solutions, including planning, requirements, development, testing, and quality assurance
Automating Deployment and Scale of IaaS/PaaS/SaaS based Solution, automate CI/CD pipeline, and scale workload deployments.
Refactoring a monolith-based application to microservices.
Define best in class standards to aid in guiding microservices based architectural decisions.
Test, evaluate and recommend technologies to improve our overall solutions.
Employ exceptional problem-solving skills, with the ability to see and solve issues before they affect business productivity
Required Skills and Qualifications
3+ years of experience / training in developing and implementing solutions on full lifecycle software development.
Understanding of and experience with the five pillars of a well-architected frameworks
Understanding of 12 factor app methodology for building distributed applications that runs in the cloud and delivered as a service.
Experience in several of the following areas:
Implementation of low-latency, high-availability, highly scalable and performant applications.
Integrate software components into a fully functional software system
Implementation of security and data protection
Document and maintain software functionality

Title: Full Stack Developer
Description:
We are seeking an experienced and passionate Full Stack Web Developer Teacher to join our team. As a Full Stack Web Developer Teacher, you will play a crucial role in educating and inspiring the next generation of web developers. Your primary responsibility will be to design and deliver comprehensive, hands-on courses that cover the fundamentals of full stack web development.
Responsibilities:
Develop curriculum: Create engaging and up-to-date curriculum for full stack web development courses, covering both front-end and back-end technologies, frameworks, and best practices.
Course delivery: Conduct lectures, workshops, and practical sessions to teach students the principles and techniques of full stack web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, server-side programming, databases, and deployment.
Provide guidance and mentorship: Offer personalized guidance and mentorship to students, helping them overcome challenges and develop their skills to become proficient full stack web developers.
Assess student progress: Design and implement assessments, projects, and assignments to evaluate student understanding and progress, providing constructive feedback and support for improvement.
Stay updated: Continuously research and stay up-to-date with the latest advancements and trends in full stack web development, incorporating relevant updates into the curriculum.
Collaborate with team members: Work closely with other instructors, curriculum developers, and educational staff to ensure a cohesive and effective learning experience for students.
Support student success: Assist students in troubleshooting technical issues, debugging code, and solving problems related to full stack web development.
Foster a positive learning environment: Create an inclusive, supportive, and collaborative classroom environment that encourages active participation, knowledge sharing, and student engagement.
Requirements:
Professional experience: A minimum of 1 years of industry experience as a full stack web developer, with a proven track record of developing web applications using various technologies and frameworks.
Expertise in full stack web development: Strong proficiency in front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and back-end technologies (such as Node.js, Python, Ruby) along with experience working with popular frameworks and libraries (React, Angular, Express, Django, Flask, etc.).
Teaching or mentoring experience: Prior experience teaching or mentoring individuals or groups in web development, with the ability to effectively explain complex concepts and guide students through hands-on exercises and projects.
Continuous learning mindset: A passion for learning and staying updated with the latest web development trends, tools, and frameworks.
Communication skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey technical concepts clearly and effectively to students of varying skill levels.
Problem-solving abilities: Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to assist students in overcoming challenges and debugging code effectively.
Educational background: A bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field is preferred, but not mandatory.
Collaboration and teamwork: Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in a team environment, sharing knowledge, ideas, and best practices with colleagues.
If you are passionate about web development and have the drive to inspire and educate aspiring developers, this is an exciting opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the next generation of web developers. Join our team and help shape the future of full stack web development education!

Title: Full Stack Developer
Description:
About MUFG Global Service (MGS)
MUFG Enterprise Solutions India Private Limited (MUFG Global Service) is the Global Capabilities Centre (GCC) of Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG), the world's fifth largest financial institution by assets. Launched in 2020, our operations has expanded to a team of over 400 employees across three offices in Bengaluru and Mumbai. We are a global integrated centre of excellence for strategic cross-functional business solutions by offering and creating value, including: IT performance: Development for applications and middleware, support for infrastructure, cyber security and network monitoring, architecture support for supply chain finance and payments products Risk Advisory: KYC Quality Assurance and Control, AML & KYC Advisory, Governance , Issue Management, Conformance Global Business Services: Business Administration and Credit Analysis support.
Job Description
Roles and Responsibilities:
Manage data and integration of disparate data with interfaces to systems along with workflows.
Develop solutions using programming languages as C#, Python, Java, Node, TypeScript, Angular and/or React.
Work with cross functional team members to develop prototype, produce design artifacts, develop components, perform and support SIT and UAT testing, triaging and bug fixing
Produce high functioning, testable code from software designs and specifications along with automated unittests and test-automation suites.
Ensure timelines and deliverables are understood and communicated.
Migrate in-house solutions to the cloud in cost-effective manner.
Implement solutions on AWS native services.
Job Requirements:
Bachelors' Degree (or foreign equivalent degree) in Information Technology, Information Systems, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Experience in the financial services or banking industry is preferred.
2+ years of programming experience atall levels of the application stack (front end/UI, middle/services, and back end/database) usinga modern language such as C#, Python, Java.
Experience working with real time and interactive web applications using Nodejs,ReactJS and/or AngularJS.
Proficient in development of Unix Shell Scripting, SQL, and non-relational database such as DynamoDB.
Strong DevOps focus and experience in Maven, NPM, Jenkins, Ansible, and Nexus Repository.
Experience with container technologies such as Kubernetes or Docker.
Experience with test-driven development and automated testing frameworks.
Good understanding of AWS serverless application model and microservice design principles.
Thorough knowledge of cloud computing concepts as Lambda, Event Source mappings, AWS toolkit, API gateway.
Experience within a technology organization in the financial services industry.
Excellent organizational, interpersonal, and communication skills and flexible and adaptable to new environments.
Ability to quickly learn new systems, products, and businesses.

4-8 years
Java / Python / C# / Node / Angular / React / DevOps / CICD / Jenkins / Kubernetes / Docker / SQL / AWS / Azure / GCP / Google Cloud Platform / Shell

Title: Full Stack Developer
Description:
Aufgaben
Become part of a team which is responsible for the global system landscape for diverse functions such as Finance & Controlling, Procurement, Corporate Audit, Legal, Compliance, Treasury, Corporate Strategy and more. Our responsibility extends from consulting and the conceptualization and realization of projects to managing the existing IT system landscape.

As part of our new team Finance Mercedes Analytics Solutions, you will develop and run advanced analytics solutions end-to-end for our Finance & Controlling units at Mercedes-Benz Cars, from Ideation over Proof-of-Concept, Professionalization to Operations. With Advanced Analytics, we develop insights into Financial KPIs for data-driven decision-making, thereby shaping the digital future of Daimler.

Join our team of experts in Advanced Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Big Data Architecture, API and Data Management.

Design overall architecture of the analytics applications for applications

o Work collaboratively with local and remote IT teams to deploy and operate the systems

o Help automate and streamline the operations and processes.

o Build and maintain tools for deployment, monitoring and operations.

o Provide Technology leadership to the team around architecture and implementation

o Maintain quality and ensure responsiveness of applications.

o Collaborate with the local, remote and business teams to design and launch new features.

o Maintain code integrity and organization.

o Help evaluate and establish appropriate technology stack
Qualifikationen
Frontend development

o Strong skills in the de facto Web 2.0 stack (as HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript) and ability to develop cross-browser, multilingual, interactive, responsive and animated content

o Strong skills in working with the most known JavaScript frameworks such as Angular(2+), React

o Experience with UI components and ability to decompose a wireframe into sub-elements; components reusability and UI multi-theming

o Experience with REST and APIs

o Experience with JS Libs (Advantages are D3.js, Graph.js, _.JS, lodash, Redux)

o Knowledge about Vue.js: single page applications

o Knowledge about state-of-the-art Dev tools (like NPM, Git/SVN, Webpack, Gulp/Grunt) and ability to transform code into solid products within short time

o Knowledge about mobilizing an application with React Native and/or Ionic is an advantage


Backend development/ Database expertise

o Strong skills in a modern language and framework combination such as Java/Spring

o Strong skills in a SQL technology, such as Postgres, MySQL or similar

o Experience working with version control tools such as Git

o Knowledge of NoSQL technologies

o Experience with container platforms such as Docker

o Experience with continuous integration practices and tools such as Jenkins

o Experience building web/mobile back-ends and APIs


System architecture

o Define which platform components to use for each use case and how

o Integration of data sources and systems


IT Operations (Maintenance, Support, others)

Testing & Automation (e.g. CI/CD, API, others)

Nice to Have:

Developer with already existing Daimler IT background/experience would be very beneficial
Affinity for advanced analytics, statistics, mathematics. Understanding of R and Python code. Knowhow about Cloudera stack and analytics workbenches (e.g. Dataiku) are an advantage.

Other qualifications needed:

Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or similar qualification and relevant work experience

Good English language skills (German language skills are an advantage, but not necessary)

Willingness to travel (up to 50%)

Good team player. Eager to take over responsibility, to learn. Flexibility

“Technology lovers”, innovative mindset

Title: Lead Developer - RPA
Description:
About lululemon India Tech Hub
lululemon is an innovative performance apparel company for yoga, running, training, and other athletic pursuits. Setting the bar in technical fabrics and functional design, we create transformational products and experiences that support people in moving, growing, connecting, and being well. We owe our success to our innovative products, commitment to our people, and the incredible connections we make in every community we're in. As a company, we focus on creating positive change to build a healthier, thriving future. In particular, that includes creating an equitable, inclusive and growth-focused environment for our people. As we continue to elevate our shopping experience, our India Tech Hub plays a key role in expanding our technology capabilities in Product Systems, Merchandising and Planning, Digital Presence, distribution and logistics, and corporate systems. Our team in India works as an extension of the global team on projects of strategic importance.
Job Description
Who we are?
lululemon is a yoga-inspired technical apparel company up to big things.
The practice and philosophy of yoga informs our overall purpose to elevate the world through the power of practice.
We are proud to be a growing global company with locations all around the world, from Vancouver to Shanghai, and places in between. We owe our success to our innovative product, our emphasis on our stores, our commitment to our people, and the incredible connections we get to make in every community we are in.
Qualifications
Approximately 3-5 years of related work experience with uiPath
A degree in computer science, technology, engineering, and math STEM degree preferred or equivalent industry experience
Minimum 5 years of experience in web-based technologies
UiPath Advanced RPA Developer certification or UiARD certification preferred
Exposure to the full software development life cycle, including design, configuration, integration, testing and support including, but not limited to, gathering requirements, designing the future state solution, the development work breakdown, as well as supporting quality assurance and post-production efforts.
Desired Qualifications:
Preferred technical stack:
.Net framework and .Net Core
Understanding of relational databases
Ui Path Studio and workflow management
Experience working with APIs
Tools: Gitlab, Jira, Confluence
Experience with unit testing frameworks
Strong skills at performance application tuning A day in the life:
Develop, test and implement efficient automation solutions with a focus on scalability and reusability
Ensure design solutions meet business requirements
Set up the RPA environment (software installation, installation of related technologies, migrations and upgrades of the infrastructure)
Configure new/existing processes and objects using core workflow principles that are efficient, well structured, maintainable using Robotics technologies such as UiPath
Participate in RPA Architecture design and solutioning
Validate process design documents and report on technical feasibility
Translate business and process documents into RPA process workflows
Direct efforts to define technical, operational, and user requirements
Conduct UAT phases to identify and to fix bugs or changes
Comply with and help to enforce design and coding standards, policies, and procedures
Be actively involved in designing new RPA features and functionality, improving scalability and maintainability
Support a complex (cloud to cloud) infrastructure environment; evaluate (with recommendations) to enable proper operability of applications on both infrastructure and software levels
Support team in defining technical requirements to facilitate design, development, testing, implementation, and ongoing support of applications within scoped teams
Ensure timely resolution of blocker issues
Support existing processes in production, addressing issues in a timely fashion, respecting agreed upon service level objectives
Be an active voice in defining and implementing best practices, standards and procedures including quality and delivery methodologies
Ensure compliance with the documented software processes and procedures throughout the life cycle of software products
Ensure the governance models for the RPA processes are being defined and followed
Provide level 3 support for robot production issue

10-15 years
RPA / UiPath / Rest / Rest API / Git / Jira / Confluence

Title: Full Stack Developer (PHP)
Description:
Work Timings: 5:00 PM-2 AM Indian Time Monday to Friday
This is a Full-time long-term contract position with paid leaves, health insurance, and other benefits
The budget for this position is between 14-17 LPA

At ProductPandas, we are seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer with a strong focus on PHP to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 5 years of PHP experience and should have completed at least one project involving the migration of code from an older PHP version to a newer version. Experience with PHP 8.1 version is highly desirable. The successful candidate will also have a solid understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL, with a minimum of 2 years of exposure to these technologies.

Responsibilities:
Develop, maintain, and enhance web applications using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including UX/UI designers, backend developers, and project managers, to develop high-quality web applications.
Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to coding standards.
Troubleshoot and resolve software defects and issues in a timely manner.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements, and provide technical expertise in designing and implementing solutions.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices, and continuously improve technical skills.
Requirements:

Ideal Candidate Profile
Minimum of 5 years of professional PHP development experience.
Proven experience with at least one project involving migration of code from an older PHP version to a newer version.
Strong experience working on PHP 8.1 version is required
Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a minimum of 2 years of experience.
Strong understanding of MySQL and database design.
Experience with version control systems, such as Git.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.

If you are a highly skilled Full Stack Developer with a focus on PHP and have experience with HTML/CSS/JavaScript and MySQL, we would love to hear from you

Title: Full Stack Developer
Description:
About Us
Bit01 is a Technology Company, specialized in Enterprise Mobile Apps and Enterprise Web Solutions. The company takes pride in providing the best technology for their client's needs to ensure they stay ahead of competitors with cutting-edge solutions that take them through digital transformation.
We are looking for talented individuals in MEAN Stack & MERN Stack who have an "I can do this" attitude to join our team pool!
Requirements

Title: PowerBI Developers [I/E2-JM2]
Description:
JOB SYNOPSIS
We are looking for multiple PowerBI developers with vast experience in data preparation, data gateway and data warehousing projects Along With familiarity with Microsoft Business Intelligence Stack having Power BI, SSAS, SSRS, SSIS. As a Power BI developer and administration , you have expertise on Building Analysis Services reporting models. Developing visual reports, dashboards and KPI scorecards using Power BI desktop. Connecting to data sources, importing data and transforming data for Business Intelligence.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
Good experience with Ingesting data from a variety of corporate data sources and performing required transformations in the Power BI query editor using a mixture of utilizing the UI and writing M code.
Utilizing effectively the navigation features in Power BI (e.g. bookmarks, drill-through) to guide readers through a compelling data-driven story.
Provide technical support and guidance through prototyping, testing, build, and launch of Power BI products.
Should be familiar and experienced in SQL, writing stored procedures and query optimization
Developing visual reports, dashboards and KPI scorecards using Power BI desktop.
Connecting to data sources, importing data and transforming data for Business Intelligence.
Excellent in analytical thinking for translating data into informative visuals and reports.

JOB REQUIREMENTS
Able to implement row level security on data and have an understanding of application security layer models in Power BI.
Proficient in making DAX , M code, Power Bi Queries, Dynamic SQl queries in Power BI desktop.
Expertise in using advance level calculations on the data set.
Understanding how the full suite of Power BI products work is essential (embedded, Reporting Services)
Experience in writing ETL process SSIS, SSAS, Fact & dimension tables along with Snake and snowflake schema
Responsible for design methodology and project documentation.
Able to develop tabular and multidimensional models that are compatible with warehouse standards.
Adept in developing, publishing and scheduling Power BI reports as per the business requirements.
Able to properly understand the business requirements and develop data models accordingly by taking care of the resources.
Should have knowledge and skills for secondary tools such as Microsoft Azure, SQL data warehouse, PolyBase, Visual Studio, etc. NoSQL will be considered as additional skills.
Able to integrate Power BI reports into other applications using embedded analytics like Power BI service (SaaS), or by API automation. Also, one must be experienced

Title: Lead Developer - RPA
Description:
About lululemon India Tech Hub
lululemon is an innovative performance apparel company for yoga, running, training, and other athletic pursuits. Setting the bar in technical fabrics and functional design, we create transformational products and experiences that support people in moving, growing, connecting, and being well. We owe our success to our innovative products, commitment to our people, and the incredible connections we make in every community we're in. As a company, we focus on creating positive change to build a healthier, thriving future. In particular, that includes creating an equitable, inclusive and growth-focused environment for our people. As we continue to elevate our shopping experience, our India Tech Hub plays a key role in expanding our technology capabilities in Product Systems, Merchandising and Planning, Digital Presence, distribution and logistics, and corporate systems. Our team in India works as an extension of the global team on projects of strategic importance.
Job Description
Who we are?
lululemon is a yoga-inspired technical apparel company up to big things.
The practice and philosophy of yoga informs our overall purpose to elevate the world through the power of practice.
We are proud to be a growing global company with locations all around the world, from Vancouver to Shanghai, and places in between. We owe our success to our innovative product, our emphasis on our stores, our commitment to our people, and the incredible connections we get to make in every community we are in.
Qualifications
Approximately 3-5 years of related work experience with uiPath
A degree in computer science, technology, engineering, and math STEM degree preferred or equivalent industry experience
Minimum 5 years of experience in web-based technologies
UiPath Advanced RPA Developer certification or UiARD certification preferred
Exposure to the full software development life cycle, including design, configuration, integration, testing and support including, but not limited to, gathering requirements, designing the future state solution, the development work breakdown, as well as supporting quality assurance and post-production efforts.
Desired Qualifications:
Preferred technical stack:
.Net framework and .Net Core
Understanding of relational databases
Ui Path Studio and workflow management
Experience working with APIs
Tools: Gitlab, Jira, Confluence
Experience with unit testing frameworks
Strong skills at performance application tuning A day in the life:
Develop, test and implement efficient automation solutions with a focus on scalability and reusability
Ensure design solutions meet business requirements
Set up the RPA environment (software installation, installation of related technologies, migrations and upgrades of the infrastructure)
Configure new/existing processes and objects using core workflow principles that are efficient, well structured, maintainable using Robotics technologies such as UiPath
Participate in RPA Architecture design and solutioning
Validate process design documents and report on technical feasibility
Translate business and process documents into RPA process workflows
Direct efforts to define technical, operational, and user requirements
Conduct UAT phases to identify and to fix bugs or changes
Comply with and help to enforce design and coding standards, policies, and procedures
Be actively involved in designing new RPA features and functionality, improving scalability and maintainability
Support a complex (cloud to cloud) infrastructure environment; evaluate (with recommendations) to enable proper operability of applications on both infrastructure and software levels
Support team in defining technical requirements to facilitate design, development, testing, implementation, and ongoing support of applications within scoped teams
Ensure timely resolution of blocker issues
Support existing processes in production, addressing issues in a timely fashion, respecting agreed upon service level objectives
Be an active voice in defining and implementing best practices, standards and procedures including quality and delivery methodologies
Ensure compliance with the documented software processes and procedures throughout the life cycle of software products
Ensure the governance models for the RPA processes are being defined and followed
Provide level 3 support for robot production issue

10-15 years
RPA / UiPath / Rest / Rest API / Git / Jira / Confluence

Optimizing applications for maximum speed, scalability, and performance.

Familiarity with version control systems, such as Git.
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
Attention to detail and a focus on delivering high-quality work.
Ability to learn new technologies and adapt to changing project requirements.
